text: i v.1}~~‘€‘ﬁ v - . ‘ Parallel Hash Join in PostgreSQL ! * Supported in v9.6 and in v10. * Each worker builds a separate copy of the hash table. " In effect, only one side of the join — the “probe” or “outer” side — is run in parallel. The work associated with the “build” or “inner” side has to be repeated by each worker, so it's not parallel (and may contena). * To fix, Thomas Munro proposed parallel shared hash but it doesn't look like that will get committed to v10
